appSubtitle: Easily convert your favorite VS Code themes to Xcode format
uploadAreaTitle: Drag & Drop or Click to Upload
instructionsStep1: Upload VS Code JSON file, download the generated `.xccolortheme` file.
instructionsStep2: Copy the downloaded file to the following Xcode theme directory:
instructionsStep3: Restart Xcode for the theme to appear in Preferences > Themes.
disclaimerText: Please note that due to differences between VS Code and Xcode theme systems, not all colors or token scopes may be perfectly converted. Some manual adjustments might be needed for optimal appearance.
